{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WAP11 |revision=v2.8 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/01/2003 |manuf_country= |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WAPM-100B |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=Q87-WAP11V28 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=ADMtek |cpu1_model=ADM8628 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV160DB |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=ADMtek |wi1_chip1_model=ADM8628 |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF2958 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-TNC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.251 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Instant Wireless Network Access Point''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WAP11}} [http://www.seattlewireless.net/Wap11Hack Wap11Hack on SeattleWireless]
[http://web.archive.org/web/20080118163324/http://www.areawireless.net/adm8628/ Converting a WAP11 V2.8 to a DWL-700AP (via archive.org)] :describes the device as running at 75MHz and with 1MB FLA/8MB RAM The default SSID is almost assuredly '''linksys'''. Additional FCC IDs of Q87-HGA7T-4 (Linksys HGA7T, high gain antennas) and Q87-HGA5T-4 (Linksys HGA5T, high gain antennas) {{WiFiCert|W002791|10/21/2004}}
